name: Tiax NPC MOD for Baldur's Gate II

en_US.description:
Surely you remember that demented, megalomaniac priest/thief? Here's your chance to (re)meet him.
STR 9, DEX 16, CON 16, INT 10, WIS 13, CHA 9.
